description:
The Photoshop Essentials, Industry Tips and Live Examples of Tools whilst Learning Photoshop!

  • All Project Files included
  • Create Beautiful Graphics for Facebook Profile & Cover Images
  • Essential Skill Set Developed With Practical Hands-on Learning
  • Shortcuts, Workflow & Professional Design Tips
  • Taught from 10+ Years of Experience & Background of Working for Redbull, Spotify and more.


Beginner Friendly: Designed to make you comfortable and understand the tools being used.

  • You will be learning employable skills every professional Photoshop artists uses daily as well as developing good habits + industry expert tips.
  • You will understand why we are using tools and how in the future you can use them for other projects.

Project files + Live real-life example of creating FaceBook Graphics in Photoshop.

  • Access to all assets included. You get the background image, typeface and icons.
  • I discuss the process behind making a Facebook Profile Image and Cover photo as if you were designing it for a client.

The Instructor: 10+ Years of experience. Worked for Red Bull and more...

My name is Aaron Ward and I have over 10 years+ experience in Photoshop creating a mass range of graphics. Oh...and I have a diploma in Graphic design. 

I will be teaching you the level of quality expected to work for clients such as Red Bull, Spotify, Carlsberg and more whom I have had the pleasure to work for.

Finally, you get my full attention on feedback. You are welcomed and encouraged to post your final result in the student discussion section where I will provide feedback to you.

What makes this course different Aaron?

  • You get a hands on, real learning experience for practical use.
  • The skills you learn can be applied to your freelance and design career
  • All files are supplied
  • You get industry professional tips to apply to your work.
  • Everything is clear and simple, making your learning experience enjoyable and memorable (no fuzzy-brain guarantee)
  • Each skill taught is demonstrated in the most efficient way to enforce good design habits


Take this course today and become a smart Photoshop designer.
title: Photoshop Essentials: Learn by Designing FaceBook Covers
